alert.note: Alert for Macon; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Macon and southeastern Taylor Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Garden Valley, or 10 miles southeast of Butler, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Butler, Oglethorpe, Montezuma, Marshallville, Reynolds, Ideal, Whitewater State Park, Rupert, Garden Valley, Hicks, Potterville, Winchester and Bartlett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
